subject: French Open (Tennis)
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: The organizers of the French Open filed a lawsuit Friday to prevent online gambling companies from offering bets on the tournament. The complaint, which was filed in courts in Liège, Belgium, and in Paris, seeks injunctions against the companies Betfair, Bwin and Ladbrokes.
